ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team9

Class URLAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team9.URLAccess

  • public class URLAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    URLAccess class takes string URL address API as an argument and retrieves the JSON data for the specified location.
    Author:
    Amha Tsegaye Team9

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      URLAccess()
      This default constructor is used to access URLAcess methods.
      URLAccess(java.lang.String openWeatherURL)
      The default constructor takes the URL API as a string use the current country and city using the helper method to retrieve the JSON DATA.
      URLAccess(java.lang.String openWeatherURL, java.lang.String city)
      The default constructor takes the URL API and city as argument for the current country to retrieve the JSON DATA.
      URLAccess(java.lang.String openWeatherURL, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String country)
      The default constructor takes the URL API, city, and country name as argument to retrieve the JSON DATA.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Get method getCurrentCity reads the currentCity.

      Get method getCurrentCountry method reads the current country.
      java.lang.String getCurrentRegion()
      Get method getCurrentRegion method reads the current state or proveince.
      java.lang.String getDataJson()
      Get method getDataJson method gets the JSON file.

      • URLAccess

        public URLAccess(java.lang.String openWeatherURL)
          throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                 java.io.IOException
        The default constructor takes the URL API as a string use the current country and city using the helper method to retrieve the JSON DATA.
        Parameters:
        openWeatherURL - URL address
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - exception if the URL is wrong.
        java.io.IOException - exception if there is a connection issue.

      • URLAccess

        public URLAccess(java.lang.String openWeatherURL,
                 java.lang.String city)
          throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                 java.io.IOException
        The default constructor takes the URL API and city as argument for the current country to retrieve the JSON DATA.
        Parameters:
        openWeatherURL - URL address
        city - city specified for the current country
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - exception if the URL is wrong.
        java.io.IOException - exception if there is a connection issue.

        city - city name
